title: Chinanteco Tepetotutla (1994) New Testament
title_vernacular: Chinanteco Tepetotutla (1994) Tna̱’ ɨnj tɨj Jënj Kɨm
description: Chinanteco Tepetotutla translation of the New testament published in 1994 by Bible League. Tepetotutla Chinantec (Chinanteco de Santa Cruz Tepetotutla) is a minor Chinantecan language of Mexico, spoken in northern Oaxaca in the towns of Santa Cruz Tepetotutla, San Antonio del Barrio, San Pedro Tlatepusco, Santo Tomás Texas, Vega del Sol, and El Naranjal.

language.name: Tepetotutla Chinantec
language.area: North Oaxaca, Santa Cruz Tepetotutla, San Antonio del Barrio, San Pedro Tlatepusco, Santo Tomás Texas, Vega del Sol, El Naranjal.
